archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Stop And Start Audit On Services
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process starts and stops audits against specific services. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Not used for this process element Mandatory This process starts and stops audits against specific services. Optional
